alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:18AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Haskell, Latimer and northeastern Pittsburg Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 518 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Enterprise to 5 miles southwest of Blocker. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Hartshorne... Krebs... Quinton... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Kinta... Higgins... Damon... Blocker... Robbers Cave State Park... Mc Curtain... Enterprise... Lequire... Haileyville... Gowen... Panola... Dow... Bache... Featherston... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
